clearHistoryConfirm: Are you sure you want to clear all search history?
upgradeForUnlimited: Upgrade to Premium for unlimited searches
dailyLimitMessage: You have reached your daily free search limit. Upgrade to Premium for unlimited searches.
aiDailyLimitMessage: You've reached your daily free AI message limit. Upgrade to Premium for unlimited AI assistance.
upgradeToSeeAllSources: Upgrade to Premium to see all sources
aiWelcome: Hi! I'm your AI Search Assistant. I can help you analyze search results, verify information, and answer questions about people you're searching for. How can I help you today?
aiPlaceholder: Ask me anything about your search...
aiPremiumLockDescription: Ask anything about anyone and learn any socials about them
failedToGetAIResponse: Failed to get AI response. Please try again.
recentSearchesDescription: Your recent searches will appear here
legalSubtitle: Privacy Policy and Terms of Service
pleaseReviewPrivacy: Please review our Privacy Policy and Terms of Service to understand how we handle your data and use our service.
legalDisclaimer: DeepSearch AI only displays publicly available information from various sources. We do not verify the accuracy of this information. Please use this tool responsibly and in accordance with applicable laws.
aiResponseWhoIs: Based on publicly available information, I can help you understand who this person might be. To get detailed analysis, please provide a name, email, phone number, or username to search for.
aiResponseUsernameCheck: I can help identify which platforms a username appears on. Common platforms include LinkedIn, Instagram, Twitter/X, Facebook, GitHub, and more. Please provide a username to search for.
aiResponseVerifyEmail: I can help verify if an email or profile is legitimate by analyzing patterns, cross-referencing data, and checking for red flags. However, I can only work with publicly available information. Please provide an email or username to verify.
aiResponseDefault:
I'm here to help you search for people and analyze results. I can assist you with:

• Finding people by name, email, phone, or username
• Analyzing search results and profiles
• Verifying information from multiple sources
• Identifying social media accounts
• Understanding publicly available data

Please tell me what you'd like to search for, or ask me a question about your results!
aiPromptSearchName: Provide a person's name to search. For example: john smith
aiPromptSearchEmail: Provide an email address to search
aiPromptSearchPhone: Provide a phone number to search
aiFallbackResponse:
I'd be happy to help you search! Please provide a name, email, phone number, or username to search for. For example:

- Search for John Smith
- Find john.doe@email.com
- Look up @username
- Search +1-555-123-4567
onboardingDescription1: Search for people by name, email, phone, or username across multiple platforms and public records
onboardingDescription2: Get intelligent insights and analysis about search results with our AI-powered assistant
onboardingDescription3: We only show publicly available information. Your searches are private and secure
aiAnalysisFallback:
I found information about "{query}" across {count} platform(s): {platforms}.

Average confidence: {confidence}%

Key findings:
{findings}

All information shown is publicly available. You can click on the suggestions below to view detailed profiles.
serpApiRateLimitMessage: Monthly search limit reached. Please try again later.
